body.p: The report of the AICPA Special Committee said that the Board “should allow companies to report a statistic on the same basis it is reported for internal purposes, if the statistic is reported internally. The usefulness of information prepared only for [external] reporting is questionable. Users want to understand management’s perspective on the company and the implications of key statistics.” It also said that “key statistics to be reported [should] be limited to statistics a company has available...” (page 72).
